title: Sick Doctor
author: Lorenzo
citation: Lorenzo. "Sick Doctor: experience with Guarana (ID 53344)". Erowid.org. Jun 10, 2006. erowid.org/exp/53344
footer:

report:
I am italian, and in italy Ritalin is not very popular as in USA. But I tried to make my doctor prescribe me some Ritalin pills for my tiredness. I described him all the symptoms of tiredness (I am very very tired) and care of attenction, but the old bastard gave me guaranà pills O_o.

Well, he told me to take 3 pills a day, but I soon doubled the dosage because I didn't feel anything. I felt nothing with 6, so one day I had to do a lot of gymnastics and took 15 of them (or more, don't remember). It only made me nervous, not any stimulant effect, and the next day I had an horrible pain in my belly. My doctor is a sick motherfucker.
